Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to disability retirement benefits for sheriffs, deputy sheriffs, undersheriffs and correction officers in Nassau County
Summary: Relates to disability retirement benefits for sheriffs, deputy sheriffs, undersheriffs and correction officers in Nassau County.
LawCode: Amd ยง607-c, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to disability retirement benefits for sheriffs, deputy sheriffs, undersheriffs, and correction officers in Nassau county
